project1.title: Booze Clues
project1.description: This is our Front End Capstone project. My app is called Booze Clues. It is a way for individuals to keep track of specific spirits, wine or beer that they try while enjoying a night out on the town, at home or on vacation. When you are in the moment of relaxation, hanging with your crew or just getting some me time in, it's easy to forget about what you're drinking. But when you taste that one bottle that you just have to have, you don't want to forget what it was.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack

project2.title: Nutshell
project2.description: This is group project that was built as a single page application that incorporates Firebase CRUD to authenticate and interact with multiple components.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack

project3.title: Developer Portal
project3.description: This app is our first React project. It includes a GitHub Profile Card and the ability to track/add/delete development tools.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack

project4.title: To-Do App
project4.description: This is a to-do app with a list of unfinished tasks. When the user visits the app, the user can log in with Google authentication to create, edit, and delete tasks. This app makes full use of CRUD axios methods with Firebase.
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Webpack, Axios, Firebase, ES6 Modules, SASS, Bootstrap
